tbody.Description: Has to be uniqe to each uploader. If the model we are POSTing to has a property with the same name as name: The uploaded audio's id reference will be saved there. (Example for value: CVId)
The audio's title in database at Images model
he audio's description in database at Images model
Description of what you whant the user will upload
This will be the upload sign image of the uploader. Accepts image's path in public, example:'/images/myImage.png'. Notice the difference between this prop and defaultChosenFile.

In case we want to display a default audio. For example, when editing an already exists game audio: we will use this prop to display a default video. Accepts audio's path in public, example:'/audios/myAudio.wav'. Notice the difference between this prop and defaultThumbnailImageSrc.
Is it required to fill the input or not
If it is possible to change the audio's input's value
Send onChange method to get the data from the audioUploader and use it for your uses
Creates a reference to the chosen audio preview element

In case of choosing a file which exceeds the size limitation as they defiend at src/consts/ModulesConfig.json (which can be generated by activating config-generator.sh script), instead of a preview of the file with an error icon and a tooltip that describes the issue, there will be a popup with a messege
